sentences.english: Cumulate probability distribution of trials of random variable of uniform distribution.
sentences.chinese: 隨機變數多次試驗結果之累積機率爲均勻分佈。

sentences.english: Therefore, individual-preference curves should be substituted for statistical probabilities in decision trees.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在決策樹中個人的偏好曲線應當取代統計機率。

sentences.english: “ said Xiao Gang, the chairman of the bank of China that ranks the third in market value in Chinese banking sector, “But the possibility of the non-performing loans’ rapid increase is very slim.”
sentences.chinese: 但我認爲，銀行業不良貸款大幅增加的機率很小。

sentences.english: Twi have the highest rate of match, followed by siblings .
sentences.chinese: 雙胞胎相配的機率最高，接下來是兄弟姐妹。

sentences.english: This practice would have reduced the likelihood of inbreeding, she added.
sentences.chinese: 她還補充說，這樣做可以降低近親繁殖機率。

sentences.english: Other cloned animals had been found to have high rates of abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 克隆動物出現畸形和異常的機率相當高。

sentences.english: Stocks are slightly lower as investors weigh up the chances of whether this is a major turning point.
sentences.chinese: 投資者考量這是一個重要轉折點的機率，股市小跌。

sentences.english: Be how big lockjaw occurrence probability?
sentences.chinese: 破傷風發生的機率有多大？

sentences.english: Fabio Capello"s England also has just a 4pc chance, it said."
sentences.chinese: 而卡佩羅率領的英格蘭隊也區區只有4%的奪冠機率。

sentences.english: His quirky study uses a famous maths formula called The Drake Equation, which was first used to estimate the existence of extra-terrestrial life。
sentences.chinese: 這一公式最初被用於估算外星生命存在的機率。

sentences.english: are only 77 percent as likely to be rehospitalized after some types of major surgery.
sentences.chinese: 動大手術後，再住院的機率只有77%。

sentences.english: Kevin knew winning the lottery was a long shot, but he bought a lottery ticket anyway.
sentences.chinese: 凱文知道中樂透的機率不大，但還是買了一張彩券。

sentences.english: Photocopies of the Original Tender minimise the risk of discrepancies.
sentences.chinese: 標書正本影印件能最大限度地減少差異的機率。

sentences.english: The odds had been entirely in her favor[7].
sentences.chinese: 這個機率完全是有利於她的啊，但她還是被抽中了。

sentences.english: The probability of losing elite genotypes in pedigree was larger than in mass selection.
sentences.chinese: 優良基因型的丟失機率，系譜法高於混合法。

sentences.english: A daily cup may reduce your chances of getting a cold.
sentences.chinese: 每天一杯酸奶能減低患感冒的機率。
